document.full_text: armed looters set fire to parts of sudan's disputed abyei border town on monday, the united nations said, days after north sudanese troops seized it, pushing the north and south closer to conflict.
document.title: armed looters burn sudan's disputed abyei town: u.n.
lines_and_colors: armed looters set fire to parts of sudan's disputed abyei border town on monday, the united nations said, days after north sudanese troops seized it, pushing the north and south closer to conflict.
